availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Bradburn (Indianapolis, Marion County, Indiana, soldier - sgt. 12th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Indianapolis, Marion County, Indiana, soldier. Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware native. Farmer in Indianapolis, Marion County, Indiana, in 1856. Served in the 1st Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 21, 1856 to November 21, 1861. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private, sergeant, and first lieutenant from December 21, 1863 to August 23, 1865.

ab.bibl:

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 340.
